description_html:
Reminiscent of a floating, luminous full moon in the night sky, Satellight’s poetic design is minimalistic yet full of personality. The orb-shaped diffuser is made of hand-blown glass in milk-white color and lodged into a transparent, wide blown glass body. The diffuser’s smooth satin finish brings to mind celestial imagery of planets hovering in space. When turned on, the dimmable LED source transmits a warm, gentle light reflecting across the glossy transparent base.

The product design Eugeni Quitllet often describes himself as a “Disoñador”, which can be interpreted as “a mixture between a designer and a dreamer”. When talking about his inspiration for Satellight, Quitllet articulated:” I dreamed I was taking a piece of the sun to share it with the world, holding a ball of light in my hands.  I captured the light under a glass bell so it couldn't escape and I kept it for you.” The form and concept of the lamp represents light's pressure to escape and return to the sun. Satellight is a piece of light that is never trapped and continues to travel.
Satellight is available in two sizes for the table version: a large and a compact one, making it easy for its design to integrate into any space for different uses. Additionally, Satellight is available in a suspension version.
